Articles.Content:
***THE MULTIFARIOUS CHALLENGE***

**Have you ever built a boat, plane, or VTOL craft? Well, now you have to combine all 3** ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)

**Multifarious means multiple btw**

**So, to win this challenge you must build all 3 of these things COMBINED. Sounds easy right?** 

**Want to now why not? It must be one stage.** 

**mwahahaha...**

**Rules :**

**Must be in one stage.**

**No copying**

**Have Fun** ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

**Requirements :**

***Boat*** **must move it water and maneuver.**

***Plane*** **must have at least 2 wings, a way to fly in the air,** 

**and at least 1 vertical stabilizer.**

***VTOL*** **must be able to take off and land vertically.**

***SUBMARINE*** **must go under water at least -100m and resurface.** 

***Easy***

**Build only 2 of these combined**

**Multiple stages are allowed**

**-**

**-**

**-**

***Moderate***

**Build with all requirements**

**-BlueCanary**

**-**

**-**

***Hard***

**Build with all requirements plus 6 kerbals** 

**without using seats**

**-**

**-**

**-**

***SUPER HARDCORE***

**Same as hard only you must add a** 

**submarine mode**

**-**

**-**

**-**

**If you have won one of these difficulties then you get a banner!** ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

[![oaudlp57e55.png](http://www.auplod.com/u/oaudlp57e55.png)](http://www.auplod.com/i-oaudlp57e55.html)

***Thats it for the challenge thank you for participating***

***Don't forget to rate 5 stars!***

***Youtube:*** [*https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCd9rNouFjlH\_RthLZoDUPbA*](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCd9rNouFjlH_RthLZoDUPbA)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-10T11:57:26Z" title="06/10/2015 11:57  AM" data-short="9 yr">June 10, 2015</time> by PixelStory**

Is a submarine even possible in stock? My entry coming soon, probably moderate but with six kerbals since I have no idea where to start with submarines.

EDIT: Saw your edit, Hard mode entry coming soon, current testing is looking surprisingly good.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-09T19:44:00Z" title="06/09/2015 07:44  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 9, 2015</time> by BlueCanary**

Yes, it is possible. It is hard though. Here:

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/0FABwvGCMeo?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Do you have some sort of strict definition difference that makes normal VTOLs not planes?

Are you specifically looking for a seaplane with VTOL capability?

For example, does this count as a plane? (From an older version of KSP)

[![wjFr1bf.png](http://i.imgur.com/wjFr1bf.png)](http://imgur.com/wjFr1bf)

A plane must have 2 wings, at least one way to move in the air, and at least 1 vertical stabilizer. That counts as a plane in this comp. It looks like that craft has the requirements to be a plane, so yes.

Well, here's what I have so far, it works better than I expected but needs work on water capabilities.

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/%5B/color%5DXUmv4%5Bcolor=#333333%5D)
How do you define a boat? Is every thing floating in water a boat, or does it have to reach certain speed (or even do certain maneuvers) on the water surface?
Please read the updated requirements section :3
In which case my entry isn't a boat, it would probably blow up if it went much above 10m/s. New entry coming soon then,
If its because of the speed then no, it is a boat. The speed was unnecessary for a requirement.

> 
> If its because of the speed then no, it is a boat. The speed was unnecessary for a requirement.

Ok, that's good because otherwise my new entry wouldn't count as a boat either (it can do 45m/s but things tend to fall off, it can do 38.6m/s safely though).

Here it is, I had to cut a lot of fuel and kerbal space to get it to float (things seem way less floaty than pre-1.0) but it is a much better boat than my old one:

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/%5B/color%5D7nEg9%5Bcolor=#333333%5D)

Ok, thank you blue cannary.

Very Nice!

You may take the winner badge. Just click it.

> 
> Ok, thank you blue cannary.
> Very Nice!
> 
> You may take the winner badge. Just click it.

Awesome!

Think I've added the badge, did this work?
